title: New version of protocol 2 images pokipoki

source.description:
Between May and June 1993, Slovenia competed in the qualifiers for the EuroBasket 1993, where the team won all seven games and therefore qualified for its first EuroBasket. At the main tournament, held in Germany, Slovenia finished in 14th place out of 16 teams with one win and two defeats. Between May and June 1993, Slovenia competed in the qualifiers for the EuroBasket 1993, where the team won all seven games and therefore qualified for its first EuroBasket. At the main tournament, held in Germany, Slovenia finished in 14th place out of 16 teams with one win and two defeats.
Protocol Repository and Exporting
Once protocols are created, they can be exported for use in other sciNote projects and/or copied directly to the sciNote Protocol Repository, where they are versioned and accessible to designated users.

source.title: Protocol for Mycobacterium ulcerans DNA detection in mosquitoes using qPCR
source.title_html: Protocol for Mycobacterium ulcerans DNA detection in mosquitoes using qPCR
source.article_citation: Singh A, McBride WJH, Govan B, Pearson M, Ritchie SA (2019) A survey on Mycobacterium ulcerans in Mosquitoes and March flies captured from endemic areas of Northern Queensland, Australia. PLoS Negl Trop Dis 13(2): e0006745. doi: 10.1371/journal.pntd.0006745

source.description: {"blocks":[{"key":"94c08","text":"This protocol outline steps to detect Mycobacterium ulcerans from insect samples. Extraction of DNA is conducted by using FastDNA kit.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}
